name: Rud Pedersen Public Affairs Company
goal:
Rud Pedersen Public Affairs Company is a consultancy firm specialising in political advisory, analysis and strategic counseling.
Rud Pedersen is situated in Norway, Sweden, Finland, Denmark and in Brussels.
interests: Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Food Safety, Taxation
euInitiatives:
We work with a broad range of policy areas including (but not excluding) Financial services, taxation, Energy, Health-Care.
We aim at keeping up a broad dialogue with stakeholders in the EU, Commission and Agencies.
